LanguageData.DemonTentaclePenis.label: demon tentacles
LanguageData.DemonTentaclePenis.description: A thin fleshy tentacle, with large barbs along the shaft, and a large arrowhead-shaped head.
LanguageData.DemonPenis.label: demon penis
LanguageData.DemonPenis.description: A penis composed of warped flesh, spikes and barbs tha mimics the shape of a humanlike penis. Goth acessories, like spiked cock rings, are pretty often adorned by users of these.
LanguageData.DemonVagina.label: demon vagina
LanguageData.DemonVagina.description: A vagina that on the outside ressembles a humanlike one, but clearly warped once the lips spread apart. The lips have barbs ressembling teeth, the clitoris is pointy like a stinger, and small tentacles line the internal walls. Despite looking frigtening, it is mostly harmless. Mostly.
LanguageData.DemonAnus.label: demon anus
LanguageData.DemonAnus.description: An anus full of tentacles. A literal hellhole.
